decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications:  ST_24_1FITZROYCRESCENT_00, ST_24_1FITZROYCRESCENT_01 (Rev B)  Received:  16 July 2024.  

Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - The detached single storey rear outbuilding hereby permitted shall be constructed with charcoal coloured cedral cement boards, EPDM (ethylene propylene diene monomer) roofing, grey aluminium windows and doors and an appropriate plastic or metal water butt, guttering and drainpipe only.  

Reasons:  To prevent harm to the character and appearance of the house's rear garden and Conservation Area in accordance with Local Plan Policies SC7 (Residential extensions and alterations), CC1 (Context and character), CC2 (Urban design and architecture) and CC4 (Heritage) and the Residential Extension Guidelines.

Condition : 4 - The detached single storey rear outbuilding hereby permitted shall only be used for a purpose incidental to the enjoyment of the house at No. 1 Fitzroy Crescent, W4 3EL described at the top of this decision letter and for no other purpose (for example, it may not be used as a self-contained dwelling or contain a bedroom, bathroom, kitchen or other primary residential accommodation, nor may it be used for business purposes).  

Reason:  In order to protect neighbour living conditions and the character of the area in accordance with Local Plan Policies SC7 (Residential extensions and alterations), CC1 (Context and character), CC2 (Urban design and architecture), CC4 (Heritage) and EQ5 (Noise) and the Residential Extension Guidelines.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows, doors or other glazed openings shall be formed in the detached single storey rear outbuilding hereby approved.  

Reasons:  To protect the character and appearance of the house and neighbour living conditions in accordance with Local Plan Policies SC7 (Residential extensions and alterations), CC1 (Context and character), CC2 (Urban design and architecture) and CC4 (Heritage) and the Residential Extension Guidelines.
description: Erection of a detached single storey rear outbuilding at the rear of the house's rear garden.
